description: Number of positive threshold functions of n variables.
comments: _Michael Somos_ (Mar 13 2012) asks if A003187 and A132187 are the same. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 13 2012
references: S. Muroga, Threshold Logic and Its Applications. Wiley, NY, 1971, p. 214.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
